name: mern-booking-app-main
description: This guide will walk you through the process of setting up the MERN Booking App on your local machine.

scripts.startlocal: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev-setup: cd backend && npm i && cd .. && cd frontend && npm i
scripts.prod-setup: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm i && npm run build
